languages.text: "Славно, что мы с тобой отныне боевые товарищи, {name}! Соберешься еще пострелять в ксеносов — зови, быть может и окажу тебе милость своей компанией". {n}Каллигос задорно подмигивает.{/n} "И я, так и быть, теперь буду звать тебя на охоту".

traits.locale_text: "Славно, что мы с тобой отныне боевые товарищи, {name}! Соберешься еще пострелять в ксеносов — зови, быть может и окажу тебе милость своей компанией". {n}Каллигос задорно подмигивает.{/n} "И я, так и быть, теперь буду звать тебя на охоту".

languages.text: "You and I now share the bond of battle, {name}! Let me know if you ever feel like shooting some xenos, and I might just bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you.{/n} "And I, in turn, will have no choice but to invite you on my future hunts."
languages.original_text: "Славно, что мы с тобой отныне боевые товарищи, {name}! Соберешься еще пострелять в ксеносов — зови, быть может и окажу тебе милость своей компанией". {n}Каллигос задорно подмигивает.{/n} "И я, так и быть, теперь буду звать тебя на охоту".

traits.locale_text: "It's great that we're brothers-in-arms from now on, {name}! Call me if you ever feel like shooting up some xenos, and I may bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you cheerfully.{/n} "And I, in turn, will invite you to my hunts now, too."

"It's great that we're brothers-in-arms from now on, {name}! Call me if you ever feel like shooting up some xenos, and I may bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you cheerfully.{/n} "And I, in turn, will invite you to my hunts now, too."

"It's great that we're comrades-in-arms from now on, {name}! Call me if you ever feel like shooting up some xenos, and I may bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you cheerfully.{/n} "And I, in turn, will invite you to my hunts now, too."

"It's great that we're comrades-in-arms from now on, {name}! Call me if you ever feel like shooting up some xenos, and I may bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you cheerfully.{/n} "And I, in turn, will invite you to my hunts now, too."

"You and I now share the bond of battle, {name}! Let me know if you ever feel like shooting some xenos, and I might just bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you.{/n} "And I, in turn, will have no choice but to invite you on my future hunts."

"You and I now share the bond of battle, {name}! Let me know if you ever feel like shooting some xenos, and I might just bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you.{/n} "And I, in turn, will have no choice but to invite you on my future hunts."

languages.text: «¡Ahora compartimos los lazos de haber luchado juntos, {name}! Llámeme si alguna vez le apetece disparar a algunos xenos, y tal vez le conceda el honor de mi compañía». {n}Calligos te guiña un ojo alegremente.{/n} «Y yo, a cambio, le invitaré también a mis futuras cacerías».
languages.original_text: "You and I now share the bond of battle, {name}! Let me know if you ever feel like shooting some xenos, and I might just bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you.{/n} "And I, in turn, will have no choice but to invite you on my future hunts."

traits.locale_text: «¡Me alegro de que a partir de ahora seamos hermanos de armas, {name}! Llámeme si alguna vez le apetece disparar a algunos xenos, y tal vez le conceda el honor de mi compañía». {n}Calligos te guiña un ojo alegremente.{/n} «Y yo, a cambio, le invitaré también a mis futuras cacerías».

languages.text: “从现在开始，咱们就是战友了，{name}！如果你打算杀点异形，记得跟我说一声，说不定我会愿意陪你一起去。”{n}卡里戈斯朝你眨眨眼。{/n}“如果以后我打算狩猎的话，那毫无疑问，我也会邀请你一起参加。”
languages.original_text: "You and I now share the bond of battle, {name}! Let me know if you ever feel like shooting some xenos, and I might just bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you.{/n} "And I, in turn, will have no choice but to invite you on my future hunts."

traits.locale_text: “真不错！从现在起，咱们就是战友了，{name}！如果你打算杀点异形，记得跟我说一声，说不定我会愿意陪你一起去。”{n}卡里戈斯愉快地向你眨眨眼。{/n}“反过来，我也会邀请你参加我的狩猎。”

languages.text: « Désormais, nous voilà compagnons d'armes, {name} ! Si l'envie vous prend de chasser les xénos, contactez-moi et je vous ferai peut-être l'honneur de vous accompagner, {n}dit Calligos en vous faisant un clin d'œil.{/n} De mon côté, je ne manquerai pas de vous inviter à mes parties de chasse. »
languages.original_text: "You and I now share the bond of battle, {name}! Let me know if you ever feel like shooting some xenos, and I might just bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you.{/n} "And I, in turn, will have no choice but to invite you on my future hunts."

traits.locale_text: « Désormais, nous voilà compagnons d'armes, {name} ! Si l'envie vous prend de chasser les xénos, contactez-moi et je vous ferai peut-être l'honneur de vous accompagner, {n}dit Calligos en vous faisant un clin d'œil.{/n} De mon côté, je ne manquerai pas de vous inviter à mes parties de chasse. »

languages.text: 「これから俺たちは戦友だ、{name}！異種族どものを撃ち殺したくなったら連絡をしてくれ。我が仲間として、お前を祝福してやらんこともない」{n}カリゴスは、あなたにウインクする。{/n}「そして俺も、見返りに今度は俺の狩りに招待しよう」
languages.original_text: "You and I now share the bond of battle, {name}! Let me know if you ever feel like shooting some xenos, and I might just bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you.{/n} "And I, in turn, will have no choice but to invite you on my future hunts."

traits.locale_text: 「これから俺たちは戦友だ、{name}！ゼノどものを撃ち殺したくなったら連絡をしてくれ。我が仲間として、お前を祝福してやらんこともない」{n}カリゴスは、あなたに明るくウインクする。{/n}「そして俺も、見返りに今度は俺の狩りに招待しよう」

languages.text: "Euch und mich verbindet nun das Band der Schlacht, {name}! Lasst es mich wissen, wenn Euch jemals danach sein sollte, ein paar Xenos zu erschießen. Vielleicht beehre ich Euch dann mit meiner Gesellschaft." {n}Calligos zwinkert dir zu.{/n} "Und mir für meinen Teil bleibt keine andere Wahl, als Euch zu meinen zukünftigen Jagden einzuladen."
languages.original_text: "You and I now share the bond of battle, {name}! Let me know if you ever feel like shooting some xenos, and I might just bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you.{/n} "And I, in turn, will have no choice but to invite you on my future hunts."

traits.locale_text: "Schön, dass wir von nun an Waffenkameraden sind, {name}! Ruft mich, wenn Euch mal danach ist, Xenos zu erschießen. Vielleicht segne ich Euch mit meiner Gesellschaft." {n}Calligos zwinkert dir fröhlich zu.{/n} "Und ich werde Euch im Gegenzug auch auf meine Jagdausflüge einladen."

languages.text: "Seninle aramızda artık bir çatışma bağı kuruldu {name}! Birkaç zeno vurmak istersen bana haber ver. Kim bilir, belki seni yoldaşlığımla kutsayabilirim." {n}Calligos sana göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Karşılığında da gelecekteki avlarıma mecburen seni davet ederim."
languages.original_text: "You and I now share the bond of battle, {name}! Let me know if you ever feel like shooting some xenos, and I might just bless you with my company." {n}Calligos winks at you.{/n} "And I, in turn, will have no choice but to invite you on my future hunts."
